name: Khedut.com
desc: A solution for stable market access. Here the farmers can connect with the businessmen and get maximum profit.

name: Techy Software
desc: A MERN stack-based platform where users can review companies and their services, integrated with Google Photos.

name: EDUcrest
desc: A learning platform where users can choose courses, get video transcripts, and auto-generated quizzes using Speech-to-Text and Gemini API.

name: SponsorSpace
desc: A platform made with Next.js where fans can support developers by giving them funds.

name: SoundLux
desc: A website for SoundLux, designed using Webflow, showcasing creative web design expertise.

name: Flavour fusion
desc: A MERN-based restaurant website with a focus on user authentication and attractive UI design.

name: Sansthaein Aur Samvidhan
desc: A gamified platform to spread constitutional literacy, structured to educate users on constitutional institutions.

name: Mercedes S-class (Web Design)
desc: A website designed using Wix Studios, showcasing Mercedes cars and highlighting web design skills.

name: Spotify Clone
desc: A simple clone of Spotify made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring a music player interface.

name: Travel with Krish
desc: A travel-themed website created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to provide travel insights and destination guides.

name: StudySync
desc: An educational website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering resources for students.

name: Memory Game
desc: A simple memory game made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to test users' memory skills.

name: Producer-Consumer Simulator
desc: A visual simulator for the Producer-Consumer problem, demonstrating synchronization between producer and consumer threads with buffer management.
